description: Cruising at the bar scene, sound familiar? 18 year old Ryan Phillips is enjoying himself on his first day in the Florida Keys. Concluding this lustful escapade, both boys explode with creamy boy goodness, covering themselves from neck to crotch.
title: CitiBoyz 21: Tropical Twinks 2, Scene #03
